Headline: Sofia Barrett
Article_Body: Sofia Barrett is a Production Assistant with CNN Business, assisting the video team to produce videos on a variety of topics including e-sports, Tesla, and TikTok.   Prior to joining CNN, Barrett held various video, promotions and marketing positions at ABC News, CBS Television, and American Public Television.   Barrett graduated from Emerson College in Boston and holds a B.F.A degree in Visual and Media Arts.
